CALICE::EncodingStringHelper

CALICE::EncodingStringHelper Class Reference

Utility class to get the field description according to an lcio BitField64. More...

#include <EncodingStringHelper.hh>

Static Public Member Functions

static std::string GetFieldDesc (const std::string FieldName, const unsigned int FieldMask, const unsigned int FieldShift, const unsigned int startbit)

Detailed Description

Utility class to get the field description according to an lcio BitField64.

Author:

Member Function Documentation

std::string CALICE::EncodingStringHelper::GetFieldDesc ( const std::string  FieldName,
const unsigned int  FieldMask,
const unsigned int  FieldShift,
const unsigned int  startbit 
) [static]
Parameters:
FieldName - the identifier of the field, e.g. "module"
FieldMask - the bitmask which specifies the bits used for this field
FieldShift - using the shift together with the mask you get field at the lowest bits
startbit - an overall shift of all fields
